Hello, awesome community!

I have tried DMP for the first time yesterday, and it was really hard to accomplish one simple task, solution to which i have still not found (not in the community question, neither in the manual). How do i fly with my friend in the same spacecraft? Assuming i have 2 seats in my ship, how do we both spawn at the launchpad in my ship? Thanx in advance!

Also, how to setup a local connection? When playing on a local connection, will my friend be using my local files (meaning, he would have access to the same mods in the GameData folder)?

Welcome aboard!

I've moved this over to General Add-on Affairs, the best place for mod-related questions.
